content.rendered:
Directed by Alethea Jones. Marie Jamora. Jamal Sims. Diego Velasco.

Written by Samantha Cordero. Mackenzie Dohr. Alison Levering. Alison Levering. Gabe Liedman. Phylicia Pearl Mpasi. Christina Nieves. Annabel Oakes. Laura Pollak. Laura Pollak. Kayla Richardson. Raul Martin Romero. Auriel Rudnick. Robert Sudduth.

Cast Madison Thompson (Susan 1). Marisa Davila (Jane 1). Cheyenne Isabel Wells (Olivia 1). Jason Schmidt (Buddy 1). Kallie Hu (Peg 1). Charlotte Kavanagh (Rosemary 1). Ari Notartomaso (Cynthia 1). Johnathan Nieves (Richie 1). Josette Halpert (Dot 1). Tricia Fukuhara (Nancy 1). Matt Kennedy (Orson 1). Shanel Bailey (Hazel 1). Maxwell Whittington-Cooper (Wally 1). Nicholas McDonough (Gil 1). Alexis Sides (Potato 1). Maximo Salas (Shy Guy 1). Victor Lau (Floyd 1). Peter D’Souza (Tommy). Summer Lynn Gillespie (Polly). Chris McNally (Leonard Daniels). Niamh Wilson (Lydia). Zac Vran (Irving).

Language English.

Producers Peter CabadaHagan. Samie Kim Falvey. Adam Fishbach. Grace Gilroy. Gina Gonzalez. Camila Grillo. Jonathan Jennings. Alethea Jones. Robert Sudduth. Erik Feig. Emily Wissink. Marty Bowen. Annabel Oakes.

Production Paramount Television. Picturestart. Temple Hill Entertainment.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 10

Status OnGoing (2023–)
